title: Collective bargaining coverage down as a result of the global financial crisis (ILO - International ...
text: ( Source : ILO - International Labour Organization ) GENEVA (ILO News ) - Figures from a new ILO database on industrial relations show that collective bargaining has come under pressure in many countries since the start of the global financial
